statements: SELECT * FROM monthly_statements WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT statement_id, statement_date, activity_description FROM monthly_statements WHERE balance < 0
SELECT customer_id, statement_date FROM monthly_statements ORDER BY statement_date DESC
SELECT AVG(activity_amount) AS avg_activity_amount FROM monthly_statements GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_statements FROM monthly_statements GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_statements > 5
SELECT * FROM monthly_statements WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY statement_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT statement_date, activity_description, activity_amount FROM monthly_statements WHERE customer_id = 200 AND balance < 0 ORDER BY activity_amount ASC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(activity_amount) AS total_activity_amount FROM monthly_statements GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_activity_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_activity_amount DESC
SELECT statement_id, statement_date, balance FROM monthly_statements WHERE statement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY balance DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(balance) AS average_balance FROM monthly_statements WHERE customer_id = 300
SELECT statement_id, statement_date, balance FROM monthly_statements WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM monthly_statements ORDER BY statement_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT * FROM monthly_statements WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY statement_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT statement_id, statement_date, account_activity FROM monthly_statements WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY statement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%' AND address <> '' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Monthly_Statements;
SELECT statement_id, statement_date, balance FROM Monthly_Statements ORDER BY statement_date DESC;
SELECT activity_description, balance FROM Monthly_Statements WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Monthly_Statements ORDER BY statement_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, billing_address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, statement_date, balance FROM Monthly_Statements WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Account_Activity WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT account_number, account_balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000
SELECT customer_id, account_balance FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 0
SELECT transaction_description, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 2
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_number, account_balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(account_balance) AS total_balance FROM customer_accounts GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_balance > 5000;

SELECT s.statement_id, s.statement_date, s.opening_balance, s.closing_balance, sd.transaction_description FROM statements s JOIN statement_details sd ON s.statement_id = sd.statement_id ORDER BY s.statement_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT t.customer_id, t.transaction_date, t.transaction_description, t.transaction_amount, c.account_balance FROM transactions t JOIN customer_accounts c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.account_balance < 0 ORDER BY t.transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM account ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customer WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT account_id, account_type FROM account WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, s.statement_date FROM transaction t INNER JOIN statement s ON t.account_id = s.customer_id;
SELECT se.entry_id, se.transaction_id FROM statement_entry se JOIN transaction t ON se.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE t.amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
